refreshModelsError: Provider must have base URL and API key configured to fetch models.
noNewModels: No new models found. All available models are already added.
refreshModelsFailed: Failed to fetch models from {{provider}}. Please check your API key and base URL.
importModelDesc: Import a GGUF model file to add it to your collection. Enable vision support for models that work with images.
visionSupportDesc: Enable if your model supports image understanding (requires MMPROJ file)
clipModelImportError: This model has CLIP architecture and cannot be imported as a text generation model. CLIP models are designed for vision tasks and require different handling.
mmprojArchitectureError: This MMProj file has "{{architecture}}" architecture but should have "clip" architecture. MMProj files must be CLIP models for vision processing.
selectMmprojFileError: Please select both model and MMPROJ files for vision models
modelNameMissing: Unable to determine model name from file
noModelFoundDesc: Available models will be listed here. If you don't have any models yet, visit the Hub to download.

addModel.title: Add New Model
addModel.description: Add a new model to the {{provider}} provider.
addModel.metadataMatchDescription: Multiple metadata matches found for "{{modelId}}". Please choose the correct one.
addModel.modelExistsDesc: Please choose a different model ID.

deleteModel.title: Delete Model: {{modelId}}
deleteModel.description: Are you sure you want to delete this model? This action cannot be undone.

deleteProvider.title: Delete Provider
deleteProvider.description: Delete this provider and all its models. This action cannot be undone.
deleteProvider.confirmDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this provider? This action cannot be undone.

editModel.title: Edit Model: {{modelId}}
editModel.description: Configure model capabilities by toggling the options below.

warning.title: Proceed with Caution
warning.description: Modifying model capabilities may affect performance and functionality. Incorrect settings could cause unexpected behavior or errors.
